channel.title: Please help me=(

item.title: Please help me=(
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[code=java] if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
     p.toY = 3285;
     p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been released from jail by " + playerName);
     sM("You have released "+p.playerName+".");
                } else {
                   sM("The name doesnt exist.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }[/code]

item.title: Please help me=(
item.dc:creator: @RID22 RID22
item.description:
@RID22 wrote:

johno2:

Can’t you do a simple tele command? And it teles the person out? Simple enough ay?

Can’t you see he’s using delta? It puts a action variable into the character file more like 1; and then he needs to change to 0; its like action = 1; make it action = 0;

item.title: Please help me=(
item.dc:creator: @prideofpk prideofpk
item.description:
@prideofpk wrote:

can someone please help me with this strange command!?

i can jail people but when i want to unjail them its says‘‘the name doesn‘t exist’’

here is the command script??

if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
     p.toY = 3285;
     p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been released from jail by " + playerName);
     sM("You have released "+p.playerName+".");
                } else {
                   sM("The name doesnt exist.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }

Read full topic
